member.name: ID3D12Debug1.SetEnableGPUBasedValidation
member.summary: This method enables or disables GPU-Based Validation (GBV) before creating a device with the debug layer enabled.
member.param: TRUE to enable GPU-Based Validation, otherwise FALSE.

member.name: ID3D12Debug1.SetEnableSynchronizedCommandQueueValidation
member.summary: Enables or disables dependent command queue synchronization when using a D3D12 device with the debug layer enabled.
member.param: TRUE to enable Dependent Command Queue Synchronization, otherwise FALSE.

member.name: ID3D12Debug1
member.summary: Adds GPU-Based Validation and Dependent Command Queue Synchronization to the debug layer.
